amendatorysection.para: As used in sections 29-3801 to 29-3809, unless the context otherwise requires:
(1) Director shall mean the Director of Correctional Services; and
(2) Prosecutor shall mean a prosecuting attorney as defined in section 29-104.

annotation.para: The procedure set out in section 29-3801 et seq., rather than that in section 29-1201 et seq., applies to instate prisoners. State v. Ebert, 235 Neb. 330, 455 N.W.2d 165 (1990).
